title: Беезумие
overview: Acclaimed Moscow theatre director (Alexander Molochnikov) and several famous artists (Eugeny Stychkin, Maxim Matveev, Aglaya Tarasova, Kristina Asmus etc.) are forced to rehearse a new play remotely. However, not everything goes according to plan, because relationships, sex and parents are now also online. And the performance itself adds to the madness, because in the main role is a real sheep.
